resources.string:
Volunteers will assist our staff with direct food distribution across Seattle.\n
Volunteering at our distribution locations provides one on one interaction with food bank clients who are in need of weekly food support.\n
The main responsibilities include site set up and tear down, food distribution, food sorting, line management and other tasks as assigned.\n
Please wear comfortable clothing and closed-toed shoes to your shift as you will be working in a busy site with moving equipment.

For the safety of our staff and other volunteers, we require a background check.\n
All volunteers must be 18 years or older and able to lift 20 - 50 lbs.
